methods.full_signature: private T runWithContext(JobExecutionContext jobExecutionContext, Callable<T> callable)
private T tryCall(Job<T> job, Progress progress)

focal_method.body:
<T> T call(Job<T> job, Progress progress, JobExecutionContext jobExecutionContext) {
    return runWithContext(jobExecutionContext, () -> tryCall(job, progress));
  }
